channel.title: Englishes on Sadrach
channel.description: Recent content in Englishes on Sadrach

item.title: sadrach
item.description: Yes, sadrach is my real name. I live in Santiago, Chile. I am not a programmer nor a designer. I’m a technology enthusiast, that’s why I know a little bit about design, programming and electronics… wait a minute, I’m an electronics technician!
